note.p: Death: 'The Galleries', Skene Street, Aberdeen (15 July 1882)
Education: Marischal College, Aberdeen. AM; MD (1842)

Career: Lecturer on Botany, King's College, Aberdeen; published 'Flora of Aberdeen' (1838); Professor of Botany, University of Aberdeen (before 1881); Professor of Natural History, Belfast (1849-1877); published 'Flora of Ulster' (1864); was deaf
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1882-1883 vol 34 pp xii-xiii
